text: Paul Robert Ignatius (born November 11, 1920) was an American government official. He served as Secretary of the Navy between 1967 and 1969 and was the Assistant Secretary of Defense during the Lyndon Johnson administration. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1920 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of the Navy Category:Politicians from California Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Paul Robert Ignatius
